source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_SEQ_00<tab>Martyn has found time between performances to train you in the ways of blue magic.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_SEQ_00<tab>Martyn est content de vos progrès.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_SEQ_01<tab>Having mastered Blood Drain, you return to Martyn, eager to continue your training. As the Great Azuro, he has already gained something of a following, and a small group of fans interrupts your conversation to have him perform his─apparently─customary pre-fight speech. While he seems to be relishing his newfound stardom rather more than anyone had anticipated, he finds time in his busy schedule to impart to you his knowledge, and arranges to meet you in Spineless Basin in central Thanalan.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_SEQ_01<tab>Vous avez assisté à une scène cocasse témoignant de la notoriété nouvelle de Martyn, alias le Bleuet masqué. Le calme revenu, votre maître vous a indiqué de le suivre au bassin des Désépinés, dans le Thanalan central, pour vous faire passer une épreuve. Mettez-vous en route.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_SEQ_02<tab>The rocky landscape of central Thanalan is plagued with hordes of vicious hornets, and the area where you rendezvous with Martyn is home to a particularly lethal variety. He suggests that you test your recently acquired Blood Drain spell on these vilekin, so that you may gain valuable experience in using blue magic against a genuine threat.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_SEQ_02<tab>Martyn vous a <var 08 E905 ((mise)) ((mis)) /var> au défi d'abattre un frelon mangeur d'hommes grâce à la magie bleue. Rendez-vous à l'endroit indiqué et préparez-vous à subir quelques piqûres.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_SEQ_03<tab>A barrage of spells soon puts paid to the man-eating hornet's attempts to sting you to death. It is slowly becoming apparent that blue magic may yet serve as a viable means of dispatching a variety of threats, and that Martyn's claims of its endless potential may be founded in fact after all.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez triomphé de l'infâme bestiole. Allez informer Martyn de votre succès.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_SEQ_04<tab>On your way back to Martyn, you find him accepting payment from a local merchant for exterminating the very same buzzing pest you were sent to slay. Although you are quick to express your displeasure at being asked to carry out menial tasks in the name of “training,” your blue mage mentor weasels out of it with practiced ease, and offers to pay your share once you have returned to Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_SEQ_04<tab>À votre grande indignation, vous avez découvert que Martyn s'était servi de votre en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment comme prétexte pour vous faire accomplir une mission rémunérée à sa place<var 1D /var>! Vous voyant fulminer, il a promis qu'il vous céderait la moitié de la récompense... Que cela suffise ou non à apaiser votre colère, rejoignez-le à présent à Ul'dah, près du sanctuaire de Milvaneth.

source:
TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_SEQ_05Martyn is under the impression that the training session in Thanalan has yielded the desired results, while you cannot shake the feeling that it was a thinly veiled ploy to earn a few extra gil at your expense. In an attempt to prove that he has not entirely forgotten about mentoring you in blue magic, he sets you the task of learning another spell, namely, Mind Blast.

※The next blue mage quest will be available from Martyn upon reaching level 20 and learning Mind Blast.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_SEQ_05Éludant sa tentative éhontée de vous flouer, votre maître un brin roublard vous a de vos progrès, avant de vous donner une nouvelle capacité à apprendre: Explosion mentale.
* Martyn propose la prochaine quête aux mages bleus de niveau 20 ayant appris l'action Explosion mentale.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_TODO_00<tab>Rendezvous with Martyn at Spineless Basin in central Thanalan.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_TODO_00<tab>Parler à Martyn, au bassin des Désépinés

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_TODO_01<tab>Survey the designated location and slay any man-eating hornets that appear.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_TODO_01<tab>Observer les alentours à l'endroit indiqué et vaincre le frelon mangeur d'hommes

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_100_000<tab>How are you gettin' on with that spellbook? If you don't know where to learn Blood Drain, it might be worth havin' a quick read first.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_100_000<tab>Tes progrès sont remarquables, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, mais nous ne pourrons pas avancer tant que tu n'auras pas maîtrisé Suceur de sang.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_SYSTEM_100_001<tab>The next blue mage quest will be available from Martyn upon learning Blood Drain.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_SYSTEM_100_001<tab>Apprenez l'action de mage bleu <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Suceur de sang<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> et revenez voir Martyn pour qu'il vous propose la prochaine quête.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_000<tab>Well, well! If it ain't my gifted apprentice, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Before you say anything, let me guess. You're here because you've learned Blood Drain and you want to hear my next bit of advice. I'm right, aren't I?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, tu viens m'annoncer que tu as appris Suceur de sang, c'est ça<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Je me disais bien que quelque chose avait changé chez toi<var 1D /var>!
TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_001<tab>Parfait. Dans ce cas, je vais te donner une épreuve à accompl...
TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_WOMANA03194_000_002<tab>(-Voix suraiguë-)Hyaaaah<var 1D /var>! Le Bleuet masqué en personne<var 1D /var>! Pincez-moi, je rêêêve<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_WOMANB03194_000_003<tab>It's like all my namedays have come at once!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_WOMANB03194_000_003<tab>Il est encore plus craquant de près... Je fooonds<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_WOMANC03194_000_004<tab>Please, say it for us one more time!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_WOMANC03194_000_004<tab>M'sieur Bleuet, faites-nous votre pose fétiche, s'il vous plaît<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_005<tab>Haha! How could I refuse my adoring public? Ahem!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_005<tab>B-bon, si vous insistez... mais juste une fois, hein.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_006<tab>Master of knowledge beyond the comprehension of mere mortals, and wielder of arcane magicks as unfathomable as the deepest ocean... Hearken, foul beasts─the indomitable keeper of the blue has come!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_006<tab>Entre chien et loup sonne l'heure bleue... C'est alors qu'il surgit, prêt à punir le crime et à ravir les cœurs...

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_WOMANA03194_000_008<tab>(-Starstruck Fan-)He said it! He actually said it!

TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_009<tab>Sorry about that. Just doin' my bit to keep the coin rollin' in. Where were we? Ah, yes. I know a great spot for a bit of trainin'. Meet me at Spineless Basin─I'll explain everythin' when we get there.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_009<tab>Ahem... T-tâchons de ne pas nous laisser distraire par ces enfantillages. Où en étais-je, déjà<var 1D /var>? Ah oui, ton épreuve<var 1D /var>! Rejoins-moi au bassin des Désépinés, je t'expliquerai tout là-bas.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_LATOOLJA_000_015<tab>When Martyn put on mask, he become Great Azuro and crowd cheer for him. But the Great Azuro has strange voice, so Latool Ja prefers him without mask.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_LATOOLJA_000_015<tab>L'idole de ces dames, notre patron Martyn est devenu... Dans le Thanalan central, plus tranquilles vous serez pour vous entraîner.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_020<tab>Glad to see you survived the trek. I hope the hornets didn't give you any bother! In fact, they're the reason we're here. There are some especially angry ones that would be perfect targets for practicin' your blue magic.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_020<tab>Bien, passons aux choses sérieuses. En guise d'épreuve, je vais te demander d'abattre une créature relativement dangereuse<var 1D /var>: le frelon mangeur d'hommes.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_021<tab>They're tough, but not too tough. Some folk call them “man-eaters” but I think that's an exaggeration. Anyway, why not give Blood Drain a try? It'll draw out some of the enemy's aether to help you cast more spells!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_021<tab>Pendant le combat, pense à utiliser Suceur de sang pour régénérer ton énergie éthérée. Ce sera une bonne occasion de mettre en pratique ce que tu as appris.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_025<tab>I think I saw a few buzzin' around over there. Even if you don't have many spells, Blood Drain should be enough!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_025<tab>Va te frotter au frelon mangeur d'hommes. Pendant le combat, pense à utiliser Suceur de sang pour régénérer ton énergie éthérée. Ce sera une bonne occasion de mettre en pratique ce que tu as appris.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MERCHANT03194_000_030<tab>Thank you, Great Azuro, for getting rid of that pesky hornet! He was a right nasty bastard if ever I saw one. Here's your payment, as agreed.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MERCHANT03194_000_030<tab>Rapide et efficace, je vous tire mon chapeau<var 1D /var>! Grâce à vous, je vais pouvoir reprendre mon colportage en toute sérénité. Tenez, pour votre peine.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_031<tab>Ah, I didn't see you there... How goes the trainin'?
TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_A1_000_001<tab>Training!? Working for free is more like it!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_A1_000_001<tab>L'“épreuve”, c'était un prétexte pour toucher une prime<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_A1_000_002<tab>Maybe one day I can get paid for doing nothing, too.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_A1_000_002<tab>Tu t'es bien servi de moi, gros malin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_032<tab>Come on, don't be like that! You had a chance to hone your skills, and that bloke can go about his business without bein' stung to buggery. If he's willin' to part with a few gil for it, who am I to say no?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_032<tab>Oui, enfin non... Écoute, tu as pu t'exercer tout en faisant une bonne action, que demander de plus<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... De l'argent<var 1D /var>? OK, OK, on partage la prime si tu veux. Allez, sans rancune<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_033<tab>Once we get back to Ul'dah, I'll divvy up the earnin's. I'll see you outside the Celestium.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_033<tab>En tout cas, tu as fait des progrès remarquables... Je me devais de le souligner. Ahem... On rentre à Ul'dah<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_LATOOLJA_000_035<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I hope Martyn's training not too grueling.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_LATOOLJA_000_035<tab>L'épreuve du patron, vous avez réussi<var 1D /var>? Ravi, vous m'en voyez.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_040<tab>Ah, there you are. What took you so long?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_040<tab>Quand je pense que tu n'étais encore qu'une jeune pousse pas plus tard qu'hier... Petit à petit, l'oiseau bleu fait son nid, serais-je tenté de dire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_041<tab>You're showin' signs of improvement, but you'll want a few more tricks up your sleeve before you can step into the arena─those pit fiends don't mess about! I reckon what you need is “Mind Blast.”
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_041<tab>Voici ton prochain devoir<var 1D /var>: débrouille-toi pour apprendre Explosion mentale.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_042<tab>Once you've learned that, come and find me, and we'll continue your trainin'. And here's your payment for the hornet you put down!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_042<tab>Tu pensais pouvoir te reposer<var 1D /var>? Désolé, il n'y a pas de repos pour les bleus... euh, les braves. Bon courage<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_043<tab>You think I'm bein' stingy? Listen, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mate)) /var>, I've already subtracted the fees for your trainin'. If I charged any less, I'd be cuttin' my own throat!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ100_03194_MARTYN_000_043<tab>Ce regard inquisiteur... Tu penses t'être fait flouer sur la prime, c'est ça<var 1D /var>? Rassure-toi, tu as reçu pile la somme prévue... amputée de mes honoraires de tuteur, cela va sans dire. Faut bien vivre, <var 08 E905 ((ma bonne dame)) ((mon bon monsieur)) /var><var 1D /var>!
